recipe.title: Moroccan Mint Tea
ingredients: 2 cups loosely packed fresh mint leaves plus mint sprigs for garnish
2 tablespoons gunpowder green tea (available at specialty tea shops)
instructions: In a teapot combine mint leaves, sugar, and tea and add boiling water. Let tea steep 5 to 10 minutes. Strain tea trough a fine sieve into teacups and garnish with mint sprigs.
